title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: IM21003Course ContentsStatic and Dynamic Input-Output Systems; Open And Closed Models; Leontiefs Static Open Model From The Standpoints Of National Income Accounts And A Generalized Statement Of The Labour Theory Of Value; Existence Of Meaningful Solutions-Conditions And Applications; Substitutability Between Inputs; Duality Between Quantity and Price Systems; Leontief Dynamic System; Application in Growth Analysis; Planning and Use of Input-Output Models.
